content:
theorem ex1 (x : Nat) : 0 + x = x := by
  cases x with
| zero   => skip
| succ y => skip
theorem ex2 (x : Nat) : 0 + x = x := by
  induction x with
| zero      => skip
| succ y ih => skip
theorem ex3 (x : Nat) : 0 + x = x := by
  cases x with
  | zero   => rfl
| succ y => skip
theorem ex4 (x : Nat) {y : Nat}
